resources.string:
Gettext Resource Editor

With this application you can translate gettext resources with your Android device. It allows to navigate in messages catalog, to search for untranslated or fuzzy messages. You may mark a message as fuzzy.

Note that the application saves a resource automaticly, it mean that your changes will not be lost.

Authors

Main Developer: Ruslan Popov;

Java Consultant: Ruslan Markelov;

Icon and Market Media Designer: Serg Barkov.

Usage

Just open the gettext resource, i.e. .po file, and translate it.

Copy button of menu is very helpful. Also, you may mark the translated message as fuzzy.

Status Line

The application shows the catalog status on its title.

The status line consists of:

*current index in the catalog;

* total count of messages inside the catalog;

* count of translated messages;

* count of messages marked as fuzzy;

* count of obsolete messages in the catalog.

Also the status line shows the filename of active resource and displays the progress bar of a translation process.

Navigation Gestures

The behaviour of this application is controlled with a simple set of following gestures:

Move to next message of the catalog. Direction is left to right.

Move to previous message of the catalog. Direction is right to left.

Search for next untranslated message of the catalog. Direction is left to right.

Search for previous unstranslated message of the catalog. Direction is right to left.

Search for next fuzzy message of the catalog. Direction is left to right.

Search for previous fuzzy message of the catalog. Direction is right to left.
